data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JRkP4ESxoYAQ7kNvgFUsHub&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDjT0YmsZxpLKKppsYq3eR2ClOcVLoDmQvOGV9Yw0vxrQ&oe=666C2A1C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=F6aoR5jashYQ7kNvgHWt2a6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAl5J-qG4YmwDEb3SxyoBTVp04gTK6bn7O5V2oPQ5f1Gg&oe=666C33A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xHrDovCfMYEQ7kNvgH7vML-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC-bC3th3R0Mv9T6wxSKGsfgUUYlPor3zkRVDAG7LJVSQ&oe=666C1B07)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tyaWtJP02rgQ7kNvgE4XXRg&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA_bzOLN218Y1N3m9g8qKhxu2V7zQRisS1kHbk9GpLf7A&oe=666C0DE6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YztkniJs3bIQ7kNvgGyFx2i&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB-eKaw9h1DKkIwCAC8TebXk0oumNb9Fe7yH4RM0KUc1g&oe=666C3A58)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dK-eHJex_dgQ7kNvgGzywod&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDy-p6SxBxVrj34e5TAAKhF23nGO0Xd19T25_gfNtOLjg&oe=666C36D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DN0g2ye3UWUQ7kNvgFfLEZt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAZke4A19qoCxcOqoK6JfSkz0kjGurDc6VELiZmza7Lbw&oe=666C1CF0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=rerRoMk3vgsQ7kNvgFScsfu&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBluv889O_6HSkbfZun9f7FpPmVP_ihzhMvMpaBjL6fpA&oe=666C076A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BVVzFSNcGiMQ7kNvgHSVAR4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBMjwY2k_VhLh4vtkipgl1WLEch0SQtGiyzaOEobg-9Sw&oe=666C1B17)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_s6IV6yaLEgQ7kNvgGhaUAD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCZfg9i2ZpBRcWvqMSbvkuds9c68idoLTPBZPn_zjtApQ&oe=666C368C)
